backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types, comparisons, authorization mixin, and storage for content updates, feedback, test results, appointments, customers, and user profiles with profile access functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a summary of a ShareAppLinkCard component used for sharing the app link with QR and copy support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching for offline support and asset updates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes, authentication guards, and layout integration for all app pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/auth/authStore.ts: Zustand auth store handling owner login, customer registration/login via localStorage, and persisted authentication state.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component rendering header, navigation menu, authentication-aware links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallHelp.t: Shows a custom install prompt for the PWA using the beforeinstallprompt event and lets users trigger or dismiss installation.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Displays the app URL with copy support and generates a QR code for sharing the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and login/logout logic using Internet Identity and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as content, test results, feedback, appointments, and customers.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and background styling including a fixed gradient overlay and image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentsPage.tsx: Form page that submits appointment requests through a mutation and shows success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Feedback submission form that sends feedback via mutation and shows success or error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordRequest: Page for submitting password reset requests, storing requests in localStorage and showing confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login interface for customers and owners with form handling, auth calls, error display, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerDashboardP: Owner control panel with tabs for managing test results, appointments, feedback, users, and password resets.
frontend/src/pages/owner/PasswordResetsS: Loads password reset requests from localStorage and allows generating and assigning 4‑digit passcodes.
frontend/src/pages/owner/TestResultsMana: Form and dialog for adding or updating test results using the updateTestResult mutation.
frontend/src/pages/owner/UsersUpdateSect: Shows locally stored customer records, including passwords, with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Customer registration form with validation, local auth registration, and customer creation via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ResetPasswordWithPass: Password reset form validating a 4-digit passcode and updating stored customer passwords in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing users to enable or disable biometric lock support via localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/ShopInfoPage.tsx: Static page displaying shop address, contact numbers, and operating hours.
frontend/src/pages/TestResultsLookupPage: Provides a serial-number-based test result lookup UI with search history stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Displays a role-based welcome dashboard linking to key customer or owner pages.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load for PWA support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, architectural notes, and existing features for the web application.
